description: A soft and comfortable men's short sleeve tee made with our Cool-Lite™ merino wool lightweight jersey. Using a halftone screen-print technique, this retro, performance inspired print is of a large-scale mountain façade.
name: Icebreaker Sphere II SS Tee - Trail - Mens

specs.value: 60% Lyocell, 40% Merino Wool, Exclusive Of Decoration
